page.title: 20HOLYWELL WELCOMES TOURISTS
page.content: Attractions in the area are connected with its industrial and religious past and{St.Winefride's Well}with its reputed healing powers is the most famous.{Pantasaph Monastery}still inhabited by Franciscan Monks attracts visitors.The{Greenfield Valley}follows the old railway line through wooded walks for 1.5miles. It includes listed buildings,reservoirs,animals and a museum with machinery and old farm tools. Organised parties can tour the {Textile Mill,}see the weaving process and the finished product.{The Grange {Military Museum}situated in a floodlit cavern has fossils and stalactites and displays a large collection of army vehicles which attracts many visitors. A designated picnic area is nearby.The opportunity of being hosts to foreign visitors has been given by twinning Holywell with Menden in West Germany.
